para: The following areas have received substantial effort in order to make using GridFTP easier, more enjoyable, etc:

itemizedlist.listitem: 100% protocol compatability with previous versions. Any client / server combination since 2.4.0 should work (barring a new client trying to invoke new functionality on an old server)
Greatly improved documentation. It is not complete, and we will continue to develop it, but it is far better than past versions.

For GT4.0.0 there is a completely new server implementation, this provides the following benefits:
More stable (one project went from on the order of 1000 failures in a large workflow with the 2.4.3 server to zero failures with the new server) More scalable (we had a single server supporting 1800 clients) Easier to extend, modify (The Data Storage Interface (DSI) allows a clean way to access things other than POSIX file systems, such as tape systems, custom storage systems, etc) Ability to run threaded (previous versions of the server were not supported running threaded) Striping is now available (allows multi-Gigabit speeds) Easier server configuration
